GSD.description:
dm ioctl: fix misbehavior if list_versions races with module loading

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.225 by commit b545c0e1e4094d4de2bdfe9a3823f9154b0c0005. For more details please see the references link.
